verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* Abia slept \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* fathers, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w buried|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* city \w of|strong="H0430"\w* David: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* son reigned \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* stead: \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* days \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land \w was|strong="H3068"\w* quiet ten years.

\w And|strong="H4196"\w* Asa did \w that|strong="H4196"\w* which was good \w and|strong="H4196"\w* pleasing \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sight \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w his|strong="H5493"\w* God, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* destroyed \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5236"\w* worship, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* broke \w the|strong="H0853"\w* statues, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* cut down \w the|strong="H0853"\w* groves.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* commanded Juda \w to|strong="H6440"\w* seek \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w the|strong="H3605"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* fathers, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w do|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* law, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* commandments.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* took \w away|strong="H5973"\w* out \w of|strong="H0776"\w* all \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Juda \w the|strong="H3588"\w* altars, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* temples, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* reigned \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w peace|strong="H8252"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* strong \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* Juda, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* quiet, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* no wars risen \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H5750"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* giving \w peace|strong="H5117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H1144"\w* said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Juda: \w Let|strong="H1961"\w* us build \w these|strong="H0428"\w* cities, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* compass \w them|strong="H5375"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* walls, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* fortify \w them|strong="H5375"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w towers|strong="H5375"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* gates, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* bars, \w while|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* quiet \w from|strong="H1961"\w* wars, \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* sought \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w the|strong="H3605"\w* God \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* fathers, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H1144"\w* hath given us peace round \w about|strong="H1961"\w*. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H0428"\w* built, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* hinderance \w in|strong="H1961"\w* building.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* Asa \w had|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w of|strong="H0505"\w* men \w that|strong="H5704"\w* bore shields \w and|strong="H0935"\w* spears \w of|strong="H0505"\w* Juda \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H0505"\w* Benjamin \w that|strong="H5704"\w* bore shields \w and|strong="H0935"\w* drew bows, \w two|strong="H3967"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* eighty \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, \w all|strong="H5704"\w* these \w were|strong="H2428"\w* most \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* men.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* Zara \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Ethiopian \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H4421"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w army|strong="H4421"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* ten hundred thousand men, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H4421"\w* three hundred chariots: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H3318"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* far \w as|strong="H6440"\w* Maresa.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* meet \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w set|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w army|strong="H1995"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* array \w for|strong="H3588"\w* battle \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* vale \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Sephata, \w which|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w near|strong="H5973"\w* Maresa:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* called upon \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* said: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* no difference \w with|strong="H3068"\w* thee, whether thou help \w with|strong="H3068"\w* few, \w or|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* many: help \w us|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*: \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* confidence \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thy name, we \w are|strong="H3068"\w* come \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* multitude. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thou art \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, let not man prevail \w against|strong="H6440"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w terrified|strong="H3966"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Ethiopians|strong="H3569"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Juda: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Ethiopians|strong="H3569"\w* fled.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Asa \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* people \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* pursued \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Gerara: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Ethiopians \w fell|strong="H5921"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w utter|strong="H3605"\w* destruction, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* army fought \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H5221"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w took|strong="H0853"\w* abundance \w of|strong="H3068"\w* spoils,

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w they|strong="H1571"\w* \w took|strong="H7617"\w* \w all|strong="H7230"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* cities round \w about|strong="H5221"\w* Gerara: \w for|strong="H3389"\w* \w a|strong="H5221"\w* \w great|strong="H7230"\w* fear \w was|strong="H3389"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* upon \w all|strong="H7230"\w* men: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w they|strong="H1571"\w* pillaged \w the|strong="H5221"\w* cities, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w carried|strong="H7617"\w* \w off|strong="H7617"\w* \w much|strong="H7230"\w* booty.
And they destroyed the sheepcotes, and took an infinite number of cattle, and of camels: and returned to Jerusalem.
